biotools.summary: A MathDAMP extension for the visualization of three-way comparisons between metabolite profiles. An intuitive color-coding is used to represent the three-way differences on density plots.

bioschemas.name: TriDAMP
bioschemas.summary: A MathDAMP extension for the visualization of three-way comparisons between metabolite profiles. An intuitive color-coding is used to represent the three-way differences on density plots.
